title: mangaLam pongiDum (kiLi kaNNi)
sahitya:
mangaLam pongiDum mAvUr vaLar dEvi vA vA haran Avi manOnmaNi varam taravE mEvi



1



tiruvaDi ingura tavamurai eduvO sheidadu ittaraiyE manOnmaNi shelva parAparaiyE



2



pirandadu kOTi azhindadu adan mEl peTra piravi tIrkka manOnmaNi bhEdamillAdu kAkka



3



aNDattir-kAdiyAgiya unnai toNDargaL nAm tudippOm manOnmaNi tuyargaLellAm tIrppAi



4



arivum Atralum vandu uraiyum shelvamum tandu niraiyum pugazhum taruvAi manOnmaNi

      harikEshan manam niraivAi
